sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SASHES, in military dreſs, are badges of diſtinction worn by the officers of moſt nations, either round their waiſt or over their ſhoulders. Thoſe for the Britiſh army are made of crimſon ſilk: for the Imperial army crimſon and gold; for the Pruſſian army black ſilk and ſilver; the Hanoverians yellow ſilk; the Portugueſe crimſon ſilk with blue taſſels.
